channel.title: Projects on Javier Casanueva Martos
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Javier Casanueva Martos

item.title: Project 2: Finger Count Project with OpenCV
item.description: Este proyecto se trata del ejercicio final del curso ‘Python for Computer Vision with OpenCV and Deep Learning’ de José Marcial Portilla en Udemy. En él vamos a ser capaces de detectar una mano, segmentarla y contar los dedos de la misma que se están mostrando gracias a la librería de Python’OpenCV’, muy popular dentro del campo de la visión por ordenador. NOTA: No se trata de un tutorial sobre cómo funciona OpenCV y sus diferentes funciones, por lo que no entraré a explicar en detalle lo que hace cada uno de sus métodos utilizados.

item.title: Project 1: My 1st Kaggle Competition - House Prices Advanced Regression Techniques
item.description: Step-by-step walk through of the well-known Kaggle competition: House Prices Advanced Regression Techniques (Score: 0.145169). This project covers the following: FRAME THE PROBLEM GET THE DATA DATA CLEANING: Looking for missing values Dealing with duplicated data Imputing missing values EXPLORATORY DATA ANALYSIS (EDA): Analysing ‘SalePrice’ Dealing with Outliers Correlations between features and target Non-linear relationships FEATURE ENGINEERING AND SELECTION ESTABLISH A BASELINE MODEL EVALUATION AND SELECTION: Feature scaling Implementing Machine Learning Models in Scikit-Learn Model Optimization Model Interpretation SUBMISSION Link to this project’s Github repository
